name: ClimateScientiaFacts
0:
”Alexa, open climate change”
”Alexa, ask climate change to tell me a change in climate fact”
”Alexa, ask climate change to tell me a change in climate trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: climate change
des: This fact skill enables the user to know the amazing facts about the change in climate from past to present.It gets the user knowing the changing scenario of the environment and the facts which have led to the current state of environment.Learning from the facts , this skill is motivating the users to protect the environment for healthy lives of coming generations.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
